title: (x) Looking for a typeface w/ rounded stroke endings - Chevin {Stephen}
content:
I need help identifying a font that comes close to the one I created (the letter "n" only) in the attached logo design. Because this is a custom letterform, I'm just looking for close, not exact.

Thanks in advance folks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [n\_logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100510011245/http:/typophile.com/files/n_logo.jpg) | 11.68 KB |
author: brianj1400

comments.content:
AG Book Rounded maybe? Or good old VAG Rounded.

I can't think of any that don't use any optical corrections on the curves.

Not bad, not bad. Would be nice to find a font that captures that flare on the top-left of the "n" however.

Thanks just the same!

Adesso is [really close](http://web.archive.org/web/20100510011245/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/presence_typo/adesso_normal/&sample_text=n&sample_size=144), Paul. Nice idea. More stroke graduation, though.

WOW! Chevin is spot on! Way to go.

Thanks so much!
leave it to stewf's encyclopaedic knowledge to come through for ya!
